riddle_text: What starts with "e", ends with "e", and contains one letter? (One Word)
With pointed fangs I sit and wait; with piercing force I crunch out fate; grabbing victims, proclaiming might; physically joining with a single bite. What am I? (One Word)
You throw away the outside of me, eat the inside of me, then throw away the inside of me. What am I? (Four Words)
I am the beginning of the end, and the end of time and space. I am essential to creation, and I surround every place. What am I? (Three Words)
I disappear when you say my name. What am I? (One Word)
I have seas but no water, coasts but no sand, towns without people, and mountains, but no land. What am I? (One Word)
I always run but never walk. I often murmur, but never talk. I have a bed, but don't need sleep, and have a mouth, but never eat. What am I? (One Word)
I'm rarely touched, but often held. If you've got wit, you'll use me well. What am I? (One Word)
I'll take what you receive and surrender it all by waving my flag. What am I? (One Word)
I always ask, but never answer. What am I? (One Word)
